extendedInfo.description: Camfrog is a cross-platform worldwide video chat community with millions of active users in thousands of video chat rooms. Video chat with anyone in the Camfrog community whether they're on an iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad, Android, Mac or PC.Features at a glance: - Join any of our thousands of chat rooms to video chat with  people all over the world from your phone. - Video chat with your friends privately whether theyâre on an iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad, Android, Mac or PC.- Add new and old friends to your Camfrog contact list.

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: I have the latest version there is and it tells me I need to update to the latest version when I try to go in chat rooms. I can deal with the ads but the not being able to go in rooms is bull. Needs fixed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: New version is freakin bullsheet
reviews.comment: Seriously the updated version is trash. Alot of ads, ok i dun mind, but i cant access some of the rooms. Its says pls update to the latest version which i have. Can u guys do somethibg about it?
reviews.author: Miz Mimi

reviews.title: horrable
reviews.comment: People will ban you for no reason, I accidently typed the word sex when I ment six and I\'m banned for 3 days. The people there are so mean.

reviews.comment: ...Why should users who have purchased pro be subject to adverts? In fact i dont see any advantages for pro users on this version.\tI agree with other users, a back camera facility would be useful.

reviews.title: Needs work
